title: The Cooper Clan
description: Tune in to America’s favorite family. It’s time to join the super duper Cooper Clan.
altHero: Mr. and Mrs. Cooper give each other a smiling look
alt1: the Cooper kids hanging out in the living room of their midcentury home
alt2: two of the Cooper kids sit on the stairs
alt3: Scamp the dog runs by with a vinyl record in his mouth
alt4: two more of the Cooper kids
